manifest.name: verminal
manifest.readme:
Verminal



INTRODUCTION

Verminal is a beautiful, fully customizable, theme for the Hyper terminal.


## üõ† Install Installing the Verminal theme for your Hyper terminal couldn't be easier. ###### Inside Your Hyper Terminal 1. `hyper i verminal` ###### Manually 1. Open `~/.hyper.js` in your favorite editor. 2. Add `verminal` to the `plugins` array. 3. Enjoy Verminal.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configure Verminal aims to deliver a beautiful experience out of the box. However, you can override the font-family or font-size specified by Verminal. 1. Open `~/.hyper.js` in your favorite editor. 2. Add a `verminal` object to the `config` object and specify `fontFamily` and/or `fontSize`. ###### Example ```javascript verminal: { fontFamily: '"My favourite font"', fontSize: 16 } ```

## ‚ö°Ô∏è Contribute Verminal is built by developers, for developers. If you are a developer and want to help improve our themes, you're more than welcome to contribute. 1. [Fork](https://help.github.com/articles/fork-a-repo/) this repository to your own GitHub account. 2. [Clone](https://help.github.com/articles/cloning-a-repository/) to your local device: `git clone git@github.com:/verminal.git` 3. Install the dependencies: `npm install`

## üë≠ Friends - [ZEIT](https://github.com/zeit)

## üîë License [MIT](https://github.com/defringe/verminal/blob/master/license) ¬© [Vernon de Goede](https://twitter.com/vernon_dg)
